Plot:

Three American brothers who have not spoken to each other in a year set 
off on a train voyage across India with a plan to find themselves and 
bond with each other -- to become brothers again like they used to be. 
Their "spiritual quest", however, veers rapidly off-course (due to events 
involving over-the-counter pain killers, Indian cough syrup, and pepper 
spray), and they eventually find themselves stranded alone in the middle 
of the desert with eleven suitcases, a printer, and a laminating machine. 
At this moment, a new, unplanned journey suddenly begins.
